name: Cashback
author: 24/7 Discount

sections.description:
Members of 24/7 Discount receive cashback at over 2,500 shops. Aside from famous brands such as Zalando, Bol.com and Wehkamp many small retailers are connected to 24/7 Discount.
With over 130,000 active users, one of the leading cashback websites in the Netherlands and the number of users is still growing rapidly.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress
  3. The plugin connects to our API and installs the needed tables, then scans your posts for words.
  4. Use the Cashback for WordPress screen to register/login
  5. Read the How it works page
sections.faq:
Q: Do i need a 24/7 Discount account?
A: Yes, you can register a new account or login into an existing one.
Q: Where do the words link to?
A: They link to the retailer pages on http://www.247discount.nl
Q: How are the links made?
A: They are scanned and adjusted after our API imports a series of keywords. These are imported from http://www.247discount.nl

Installation Instructions

  1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress
  3. The plugin connects to our API and installs the needed tables, then scans your posts for words.
  4. Use the Cashback for WordPress screen to register/login
  5. Read the How it works page
sections.changelog:
1.0

  • Updated API endpoint.
  • Added additional checks to login/register.

0.5

  • List versions from most recent at top to oldest at bottom.
